General.Name: Virgin Galactic Holdings Inc
General.Description: Virgin Galactic Holdings, Inc., an aerospace and space travel company, focuses on the development, manufacture, and operation of spaceships and related technologies. It engages in the design and development, manufacturing, ground and flight testing, spaceflight operation, and post-flight maintenance of spaceflight systems for private individuals, researchers, and government agencies. The company is headquartered in Tustin, California.
General.Address: 1700 Flight Way, Tustin, CA, United States, 92782
